content:
Friends, I was recently speaking with Paul Ruth who is part of the core team that is designing and building the new National Science Foundation testbed called FABRIC. Please find further information on FABRIC below. Paul indicated that they are interested in international collaboration.
Should you be interested in exploring collaboration on FABRIC, please can you reach out to Paul at his email address below.
You may also sign-up at the FABRIC website to receive updated information and announcements.

FABRIC news release:
https://renci.org/news/fabric-award

FABRIC website:
https://fabric-testbed.net

Paul Ruth
pruth@renci.org

Thanks

Gregg Barrett

Very good.
I would be interested in following the initiative on the Cloud Infrastructure.
If you authorize me, I would ask to represent CLAIRE at the WS on Next Generation Clloud Research Infrastructure:

https://sites.google.com/view/workshop-on-cloud-cri/home
